about: Full-stack developer leveraging expertise in TypeScript, React, and front-end technologies to contribute innovative solutions and grow in a dynamic environment.

responsibilities: Developing solutions using TypeScript, React, Vue, and .NET.
Modernizing legacy systems and creating scalable web applications with cloud integration.
Developed a TypeScript-based mock photo album API using AWS and implemented serverless architecture.
Evaluated React form builder libraries and authored comprehensive analyses to assist client decision-making.
Automated insurance calculations and payroll processes using Python, resulting in significant time savings and error reductions.
Built a clinic management system with React and Node.js.

projects.name: Revify SaaS Revenue Calculator
projects.description: Built using Next.js, TailwindCSS, and Neon Postgres. Features include AI-powered growth predictions, add-on pricing customization, and real-time MRR calculations.

projects.name: Recipe Realm
projects.description: Culinary platform developed with Flask and SQLite, featuring responsive design, user authentication, and a dynamic rating system.

projects.name: Crumbl Craver
projects.description: Next.js and Supabase application for weekly Crumbl Cookie flavor updates. Integrated web scraper for data accuracy and real-time updates.

education.university: A.A.S. in Computer Software Development, Indian Hills Community College, Ottumwa, Iowa, August 2024
